name: Howto-comment
tagline: How to add comments in all programming languages.
body:
HowTo-Comment
=============

Sample codes to describe how to add comments in every programming language.

Languages done :

1.  Ada [Show Output Ada] (http://ideone.com/nzOAtW)

2.  AWK [Show Output Awk] (http://ideone.com/qHRtXh)

3.  C [Show Output C] (http://ideone.com/UAVOu0)

4.  C++ [Show Output C++] (http://ideone.com/hLUSHY)

5.  C# [Show Output C#] (http://ideone.com/61S58l)

6.  Coffescript [Show Output CoffeScript] (http://repl.it/XPb)

7.  CSS [Show Output CSS] (#)

8.  Fortran [Show Output Fortran] (#)

9.  Go [Show Output Go] (#)

10. Haskel [Show Output Haskell] (#)

11. HTML [Show Output HTML] (http://codepen.io/tapaswenipathak/pen/KpsnG)

12. Java [Show Output Java] (http://ideone.com/XBZ5na)

13. Javascript [Show Output JavaScript] (http://ideone.com/nWgq4H)

14. Perl [Show Output Perl] (http://ideone.com/ANfeYH)

15. PHP [Show Output PHP] (http://ideone.com/zqDz4s)

16. Python [Show Output Python] (http://ideone.com/hPUX68)

17. Python3 [Show Output Python3] (http://ideone.com/aquD6h)

18. Ruby [Show Output Ruby] (#)

19. Shell [Show Output Shell] (#)


You should comment your code. It shows :heart: for the reader.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
